actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the election of clerk of the House, Sergeant at Arms, Doorkeeper, Postmaster, and Chaplin.

summary.text: Chooses Edmund L. Henshaw, Jr., of Virginia, Clerk; Kenneth R. Harding of Virginia, Sergeant at Arms; James T. Molloy of New York, Doorkeeper; Robert V. Rota of Pennsylvania, Postmaster; and Reverend Edward G. Latch, D.D. of Maryland, Chaplain of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the election of clerk of the House, Sergeant at Arms, Doorkeeper, Postmaster, and Chaplin.
